quickdeny.name: Too high
quickdeny.description: For players attempting to verify above Platinum before open
quickdeny.reply: Rank Verify is only open to Plat and below (Opens 31/08)

quickdeny.name: Denied
quickdeny.description: For faked images, or general deny without a reason (e.g duplicate submissions or already has a rank)

quickdeny.name: Already verified
quickdeny.description: For members who are already verified the requested rank

quickdeny.name: Image cropped
quickdeny.description: They have cropped their image (Must be showing their full valorant screen)

quickdeny.name: Not screenshot
quickdeny.description: They haven't captured their image using Win + PrtSc
quickdeny.reply: Submitted a Photo, not a Screenshot (Win + PrtSc)

quickdeny.name: No tag (Platinum+)
quickdeny.description: They are not hovering over their tag on the top right of their game. Only Plat+ requires this.
quickdeny.reply: Not hovering over your in-game tag (Top right)

quickdeny.name: No date
quickdeny.description: They do not have today's date in party chat. All ranks require this.

quickdeny.name: No rank
quickdeny.description: They do not have a rank yet.

quickdeny.name: Not Competitive
quickdeny.description: They are not on the competitive queue screen.

quickdeny.name: Other region
quickdeny.description: This account is not from OCE.
